author: Al Jazeera
title: Turkey says cannot stop Russian warships accessing Black Sea
description: Ukraine has appealed to Turkey to block Russian warships from passing through straits which lead to the Black Sea.
content:
The Turkish foreign minister has said Turkey cannot stop Russian warships accessing the Black Sea via its straits, as Ukraine has requested, due to a clause in an international pact.
